 import 'package:font_awesome_flutter/font_awesome_flutter.dart';
 
 class ContactUtils {
   static void showContactAlert(BuildContext context) {
+    final isMobile = MediaQuery.of(context).size.width < 600;
+
     showDialog(
       context: context,
       builder: (context) => AlertDialog(
-        title: const Text("Contact Options",),
+        title: const Text(
+          "Contact Options",
+          style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black, fontFamily: "Poppins"),
+        ),
         content: const Text(
           "Choose an option to contact me.",
           style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black),
         ),
         actions: [
           TextButton.icon(
             onPressed: () => _launchWhatsApp("+917994689802"),
             icon: const Icon(FontAwesomeIcons.whatsapp, color: Colors.green),
-            label: const Text(
-              "WhatsApp",
-              style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black, fontFamily: "poppins"),
-            ),
+            label: isMobile

+                : const Text(
+                    "WhatsApp",

+                      fontFamily: "Poppins",
+                    ),
+                  ),
           ),

             icon: const Icon(Icons.email, color: Colors.red),
-            label: const Text(
-              "Gmail",
-              style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black, fontFamily: "poppins"),
-            ),
+            label: isMobile
+                ? const SizedBox.shrink() // Hide label for mobile
+                : const Text(
+                    "Gmail",
+                    style: TextStyle(
+                      color: Colors.black,
+                      fontFamily: "Poppins",
+                    ),
+                  ),
           ),
           TextButton.icon(
             onPressed: () => _makePhoneCall("+917994689802"),
             icon: const Icon(Icons.phone, color: Colors.blue),
-            label: const Text("Call",
-              style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black, fontFamily: "poppins"),),
+            label: isMobile
+                ? const SizedBox.shrink() // Hide label for mobile
+                : const Text(
+                    "Call",
+                    style: TextStyle(
+                      color: Colors.black,
+                      fontFamily: "Poppins",
+                    ),
+                  ),
           ),
         ],
       ),
     );
